entry.title: polybiusproxy/Endor
entry.summary:
3D game engine made with Haxe and C++

Endor

A 3D game engine made with Haxe and C++.

Currently the engine is possible of loading/compiling shaders, and rendering basic objects. Lacks of a batch renderer (TODO).
